bibl.title: A Byzantine Monastic Letter at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Private letter, likely from the so-called monastery of Epiphanius, and now kept in the Department of Medieval Art at the Metropolitan Museum. Thebes (?), VI AD. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. New York Metrop. Museum Inv. MMA acc. 14.1.602d
Michael Zellmann-Rohrer, A Byzantine Monastic Letter at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York.
Private letter, likely from the so-called monastery of Epiphanius, and now kept in the Department of Medieval Art at the Metropolitan Museum. Thebes (?), VI AD. - Avec résumé en anglais.
